text: hi I'm Doug Barrett from the ellenwood ldi store and i'm here to talk today on the proper ballasting of the tractor and the proper air inflation of the tires what we have we're wanting to maintain a two to four percent slip when setting up our tractor for the proper demo so to do that we've got to go in and we've got to get our air pressure set properly from tire to tire and also on the back the proper inflation will basically put three bars on the ground solid on the ground that will be what you look forward and you can adjust from that by whatever piece of equipment that you've got on the back of the attractor the other thing will have will be proper ballasting which is going to be our weight issues we're going to have weight on the inside of our duels and we can set different weights for that plus we'll have weights on the front of the tractor and we can do that [Music]
